Html:
I've put together a solution I use as a template for creating modular apps using Prism 4.0 with Silverlight 4.0.

I have it posted on my website.  Please post any comments there if possible.

It should be all you need to get you started with a real world SL 4, modular, LOB application.  It uses Telerik's RibbonBar as the apps menu. 

http://www.dotnetpatterns.net/content/185-Silverlight-4.0-Prism-4.0-Telerik-Ribbon-Application-Template

Prism team, I'd love to get something like this added samples.  If you have suggestions about generic items for a base template project please let me know.

Thanks.

Hi,

Thanks for sharing this with the rest of the community. In Quickstarts and Reference Implementation there is no samples using Telerik's RibbonBar, so In my opinion it might help other users with similar scenarios.

Thanks again,

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
Well, you don't have to use Telerik to use the sample. Hopefully if you want to use some kind of other menu control, you can use the template and plug it in.
